title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2813.4 - Application evaluation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2813.4 - Application evaluation

State Regulations

Contract awards will be based on a review of items
including, but not limited to, the following: (a) organization experience; (b) region need; (c) proposed program; (d) proposed budget; and
(e) community support. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2813.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
